DOC.brief_title: A Quality of Life Study Using Insulin Potentiation Targeted LowDose (IPTLD) Chemotherapy and Nutrition Therapy in the Treatment of Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A Quality of Life Study Using Insulin Potentiation Targeted LowDose (IPTLD) Chemotherapy and Nutrition Therapy in the Treatment of Cancer.
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of cancer, age older than 18 years, requesting IPTLD and nutrition therapy diagnosis other than cancer, age younger than 18 years, requesting conventional chemotherapy
